00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 
00041 MTKt_status MtkFileToGridList(
00042   const char *filename, 
00043   int *ngrids,          
00044   char **gridlist[]      )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function. */
00047   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00048   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00049   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS file identifier */
00050 
00051   /* Check Arguments */
00052   if (filename == NULL)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00054 
00055   /* Open file. */
00056   fid = GDopen((char *)filename, DFACC_READ);
00057   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00058 
00059   /* Read the list of grids. */
00060   status = MtkFileToGridListFid(fid, ngrids, gridlist);
00061   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00062 
00063   /* Close file. */
00064   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00065   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00066   fid = FAIL;
00067 
00068   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00069 
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00072   return status_code;
00073 }
00074 
00080 MTKt_status MtkFileToGridListFid(
00081   int32 fid,            
00082   int *ngrids,          
00083   char **gridlist[]      )
00084 {
00085   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function. */
00086   intn status;          /* HDF return status */
00087   int32 strbufsize;             /* String length of grid list */
00088   int32 num_grids = 0;          /* Number of grids */
00089   char *list = NULL;            /* List of grids */
00090   char *temp = NULL;
00091   int i;
00092 
00093   /* Check Arguments */
00094   if (gridlist == NULL)
00095     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00096 
00097   *gridlist = NULL; /* Set output to NULL to prevent freeing unallocated
00098                        memory in case of error. */
00099 
00100   if (ngrids == NULL)
00101     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00102 
00103   /* Get the size of the buffer */
00104   status = GDinqgridfid(fid, NULL, &strbufsize);
00105   if (status == FAIL)
00106     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQGRID_FAILED);
00107 
00108   /* GDinqgrid does not account for null termination, */
00109   /* so we add 1 to strbufsize */
00110   list = (char*)malloc((strbufsize + 1) * sizeof(char));
00111   if (list == NULL)
00112     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00113 
00114   /* Get list of grids */
00115   status = num_grids = GDinqgridfid(fid, list, &strbufsize);
00116   if (status == FAIL)
00117     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQGRID_FAILED);
00118 
00119   *ngrids = num_grids;
00120   *gridlist = (char**)calloc(num_grids, sizeof(char*));
00121   if (*gridlist == NULL)
00122     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00123 
00124   temp = strtok(list,",");
00125   i = 0;
00126   while (temp != NULL)
00127   {
00128     (*gridlist)[i] = (char*)malloc((strlen(temp) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00129     if ((*gridlist)[i] == NULL)
00130       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00131     strcpy((*gridlist)[i],temp);
00132     temp = strtok(NULL,",");
00133     ++i;
00134   }
00135 
00136   free(list);
00137 
00138   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00139 
00140 ERROR_HANDLE:
00141   if (gridlist != NULL)
00142     MtkStringListFree(num_grids, gridlist);
00143 
00144   if (ngrids != NULL)
00145     *ngrids = -1;
00146 
00147   free(list);
00148 
00149   return status_code;
00150 }
00151 
00160 int32
00161 GDinqgridfid(int32 fid, char *objectlist, int32 * strbufsize)
00162 {
00163     int32           vgRef;  /* Vgroup reference number */
00164     int32           vGrpID; /* Vgroup ID */
00165     int32           nobj = 0;   /* Number of HDFEOS objects in file */
00166     int32           slen;   /* String length */
00167 
00168     char            name[FIELDNAMELENMAX];  /* Object name */
00169     char            class[FIELDNAMELENMAX]; /* Object class */
00170     int32           HDFfid;     /* HDF file identifier */
00171     int32           sid;        /* HDF SD identifier (not used) */
00172     intn            hdf_status_code; 
00173 
00174 
00175     /* Get HDF file identifier. */
00176     hdf_status_code = EHidinfo(fid, &HDFfid, &sid);
00177     if (hdf_status_code == FAIL)
00178       return FAIL;
00179 
00180     /* Start Vgroup Interface */
00181     /* ---------------------- */
00182     Vstart(HDFfid);
00183 
00184 
00185     /* If string buffer size is requested then zero out counter */
00186     /* -------------------------------------------------------- */
00187     if (strbufsize != NULL)
00188     {
00189     *strbufsize = 0;
00190     }
00191     /* Search for objects from begining of HDF file */
00192     /* -------------------------------------------- */
00193     vgRef = -1;
00194 
00195     /* Loop through all objects */
00196     /* ------------------------ */
00197     while (1)
00198     {
00199     /* Get Vgroup reference number */
00200     /* --------------------------- */
00201     vgRef = Vgetid(HDFfid, vgRef);
00202 
00203     /* If no more then exist search loop */
00204     /* --------------------------------- */
00205     if (vgRef == -1)
00206     {
00207         break;
00208     }
00209     /* Get Vgroup ID, name, and class */
00210     /* ------------------------------ */
00211     vGrpID = Vattach(HDFfid, vgRef, "r");
00212     Vgetname(vGrpID, name);
00213     Vgetclass(vGrpID, class);
00214 
00215 
00216     /* If object of desired type (GRID) ... */
00217     /* -------------------------------------------------- */
00218     if (strcmp(class, "GRID") == 0)
00219     {
00220 
00221         /* Increment counter */
00222         /* ----------------- */
00223         nobj++;
00224 
00225 
00226         /* If object list requested add name to list */
00227         /* ----------------------------------------- */
00228         if (objectlist != NULL)
00229         {
00230         if (nobj == 1)
00231         {
00232             strcpy(objectlist, name);
00233         } else
00234         {
00235             strcat(objectlist, ",");
00236             strcat(objectlist, name);
00237         }
00238         }
00239         /* Compute string length of object entry */
00240         /* ------------------------------------- */
00241         slen = (nobj == 1) ? strlen(name) : strlen(name) + 1;
00242 
00243 
00244         /* If string buffer size is requested then increment buffer size */
00245         /* ------------------------------------------------------------- */
00246         if (strbufsize != NULL)
00247         {
00248         *strbufsize += slen;
00249         }
00250     }
00251     /* Detach Vgroup */
00252     /* ------------- */
00253     Vdetach(vGrpID);
00254     }
00255 
00256     /* "Close" Vgroup interface and HDFEOS file */
00257     /* ---------------------------------------- */
00258     Vend(HDFfid);
00259 
00260     return (nobj);
00261 }
